article_title: Reporter’s Phablet: Big Companies Agree, DevOps Has Hit the Big Time
article_text:
Ticketmaster’s Jody Mulkey speaks at the DevOps Enterprise Summit in San Francisco, Oct. 21, 2015. Rachael King/WSJ

The very existence of the DevOps Enterprise Summit in San Francisco was evidence of the extent to which DevOps has moved into the mainstream of corporate software development.
